author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Electra America Extends Proposal To Acquire Pure Multi-Family REIT At An All Cash Price Of Us$7.59 (Cdn$9.79) Per Unit
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - Pure Multi-Family REIT LP:
* CASH PRICE/UNIT OF US $7.59​ * NOW EXTENDED OUTSIDE DATE FOR A DEFINITIVE RESPONSE TO ITS EXTENDED OFFER TO APRIL 6, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
